reviews.review: One of the most funny and awesome games ever.  Even more fun with multiple people.

Portal 2 ist ein Strategiespiel oder Rätzelspiel und  handelt über Portale. Man kann den Einzelspieler spielen, bei der die Story gut zu Portal 1 passt, oder auch den Mehrspier spielen. Der Mehrspieler wird auch Coopmodus genannt und wie man schon lesen kann kann man im Coop spielen und eigene kleine Kammern erstellen oder auch aus dem Workshop Kammern herunterladen die je nach Schwierigkeitsgrat gut oder schlecht sein können. Leider konnte mein Freund es nicht Spielen, weil es immer nach den ersten Laden abgestürzt ist, aber bei mir läuft es und es macht sehr viel spaß es zu spielen!
Great Games :D

Puzzles really difficult at times, difficulty rising progresivement.

One of the best sequels I've ever played. Excellent sense of humor. The story is also very interesting, with all its secrets, companion cubes, cake and who knows what else, make this game not just another one of those boring puzzle games.  You'll find the first part short but the second one its much longer. You can get almost everything form this game: adventure, thinking, scaping, shooting, sci -fi in a diverse curoius enviroment... If you play it you'll understand how good it is.  Over all I'd say its a funny, unique, unpredictable, sometimes challenging,  must have game.

I could have sworn I had 24 hours on this thing...
The single player story is awesome, the first time. It leaves you with a feeling of mystery similar to the Zelda games, which is why it needs sequels. You beat it and so much stuff is left unanswered. Yep. Its maddening.
The Co-op is very bland however.
I liked the co-op for the achievement capabilities and challenges but the idea of having to go through the same levels with someone who hasnt done them before just to get to the ones you have done is somewhat a grotesque thought from my perspective.

Overall:
If you like puzzles get this game.
If you like physics get this game.
If you like trying to solve timeline paradoxes and find relations between events get this game (and its prequel).
If you like achievements get this game.
If you like stories get this game.
If you like trading cards get this game.

If you like multiplayer experience, do not get this game.
I like the part where you solve puzzles.

The narration/story is a bit messed up, like the developers misunderstood what was so good about the first game's "story", but other than that this was more of the Portal awesome awesomeness and the best implementation of user-made content.

Sebbene per gustare a pieno la storia ritengo sia fondamentale giocare prima al titolo precedente, consiglio caldamente questo gioco a tutti gli amanti del genere avventura in prima persona. Il gioco unisce la giocabilità e le meccaniche di gioco di Half Life (capolavoro da cui la serie Portal è nata come espansione), una grafica rinnovata ed alcuni nuove idee che contribuiscono a rendere l'esperienza di gioco intensa e variegata. Rispetto a Portal (1) si nota un notevole miglioramento nella longevità del gioco, ulteriormente prolungata se si conta anche la possibilità del multiplayer.

I had just quit smoking before the holidays. A pack of smokes cost me €5. Bought the game for €5 during holiday sales. I played the single player in about 10/12 hours and had loads of fun. After finishing the game I realised I bought this awesome game for the same price as that of a pack of lungcancer. Thank you Valve :)

Oh and I think the story is an excellent followup for Portal 1. You really learn alot about stuff you've been wondering about in the first game.

This game is no doubt in my mind one of the greatest video games that has ever been made. I tip my hat to Valve for creating something that was not only mentally envigorating, but also downright hilarious at the same time. I had played the first portal game beforehand at a friend's house, and I found the game to be great, but lacking a few things to make it wholly enjoyable. The sequal made all of my wishes come true and more. With the introduction of the comical Wheatley, a dynamic turn towards the history of Aperture Science, and multiplayer puzzles that had my mind boggling at some points, Portal 2 is a must play. I would indeed get stuck on some of the puzzles, but the way the story kept me intrigued drove me not to stop testing and solving. It has everything an ideal game needs: A gripping story, a unique style of gameplay, challenging levels, all added with just the right amount of robotic humor. 
The cake may be a lie, but this sequel makes up for it entirely. 10/10
its just a adventures fun puzzling game it may be old but you can do the levels over and over again i just recomend it

If there is one game that I would recommend to anyone of any age, without any doubts, its definitely Portal 2. There are no open points in this game for someone to easily criticize. This is a very unique experience which you almost can't compare to other games. I cannot say its the best game I have played but it is most certainly one of the most memorable games I've played. So far, the best story I have seen in a game as well. Truly a title you will never regret playing!

Portal 2 is one of then best PC/Mac games I have ever played, Itresting storyline and amazing plot twists, brillent levels.

Ein wirklich gelungender Titel. Man kann es stundenlang spielen. Die Story und Atmosphäre sind sehr gut und die Rätsel werden immer anspruchsvoller. Die Dialoge sorgen auch für witzige Momente.Der Coop mit eigener Story ist sehr gut gelungen und macht einfach Spaß. Der Workshop liefert immer wieder neue Maps, sowohl für den Singleplayer als auch für den Coop. Dieses Spiel ist ein Muss! 

10/10
This game has everything. Humor, graphics, clever designing, and a unique multiplayer experience. Truely a Valve masterpiece.

Portal 2 é um jogo do tipo puzzle com uma história extremamente cativante. Você vai se prender facilmente ao enredo do jogo e é sempre bom ouvir a voz meiga e sincera de GLaDoS sempre te motivando <3 Além de ter agora um novo personagem muito importante! Wheatley e sua personalidade também surpreendem bastante no jogo. Temos também grandes revelações a respeito da empresa Aperture e sua comovente história... Portal 2 também conta com o modo Co-op em que é possível passar por salas de testes tendo controle de dois robôs bem... exóticos!

É claro, tudo isso com aquele grande toque de humor que só a série Portal tem!
Multiplayer is awesome... love both portals

Обойдемся без лишних слов) Я не стану спойлерить события игры, прохождения, общую атмосферу, всю красоту этой игры, а лишь пожелаю всем без исключения пройти этот шедевр. После прохождения остаются лишь положительные эмоции, от которых я не отойду ближайшие 2-3 дня. Не важно любишь ли ты стратегические жанры, гонки, либо симуляторы, но эту игру обязан пройти каждый. Буду рекомендовать её всем своим друзьям, тем кто её еще не прошел, т.к. словами всю происходящую атмосферу не передать) 10/10
